name: SPooNS
description:
Use the Left and Right keys to Move, press Up to Jump, and press SPACE to go to your Safe Zone. 

Sometimes its difficult for people to stay in one piece when they struggle around crowds, overbearing relatives, noisy dogs, or grumpy-looking janitors. 

SPooNS follows the day-to-day life of a small boy with anxiety, trying to find somewhere safe to exist. He needs to avoid the things that make him nervous, and get out to his Mum waiting in the car- but he can't leave Mr Snuffles behind!

JANITORS will try to throw away your box!

THE CORGI will try to pee on your box!

GRANDMA will try to stop you if she sees you!

THE CROWDS will try to chat to you if they see you!
